name: AT WHAT COST
description:
They say to always fight for what is right. But are you on the right side?

When the world is calling for help. How will you respond?

  

       Go on this extraordinary mission          and build your own legacy. Features
  • 2 different gameplays
  • 2 different endings
  • best-time record system
Controls
  • Move - arrow keys, a w d
  • Jump - up key, space bar
  • Attack - f
  • Pause / Resume - escape
Credits
  • Music: https://void1gaming.itch.io/platformer-music-pack-lite
  • Sound Effects:  https://simon13666.itch.io/sound-starter-pack
